alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Carson and northwestern Gray Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported a strong thunderstorm near Pampa. This storm was moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pampa, White Deer, Skellytown and Kingsmill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. Theis type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
